data.feedback: Comprehensive planning that covers all 6 user requirements. All filesToModify and filesToRead references verified to exist in the codebase. Clean Architecture patterns correctly applied. Backend API routes match frontend plans. Minor API endpoint mismatches can be resolved during implementation.
issues: Minor: flutter_bloc dependency not in current pubspec.yaml (but correctly listed for modification)
Minor: /auth/forgot-password endpoint in frontend but not in backend routes
Minor: /api/auth/me in backend but not defined in frontend api_endpoints.dart
suggestions: Ensure flutter_bloc is added in first epic (auth-ui)
Sync API endpoint definitions between frontend and backend
Document any endpoints requiring backend additions
